description:
Google Reader for the HP TouchPad. 

-Has folder support and the capability to star, like, and share articles. 
-Integration of Facebook, Instapaper, Read It Later, and Twitter. 
-Search or add your subscriptions with multiple tag support.

New in version 1.0.6:
-new preferences
    font size for feed list and article list
    article list thumbnails (experimental)
    sort articles (newest/oldest first)
    web icon action (new card or inline)
    slide article list view (when selecting 
-feed/article/never)
-subscription management
-mark previous as read
-retrieve full article text from Read It Later
-Instapaper and Read It Later support
-help section with explaination of icons

Bugfixes:
-selected article in article list should stay in view 
-when swiping through articles
-web icon state
-prefetching of article fixes (including duplicate articles)
